job.title: Software Engineer, Apple Pay
job.description: ltbrgtltstronggtSummaryltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtApple Pay Server Engineering is the place to be if you are interested in working on awesome technology that is used by millions of people every single day As part of the Apple Pay Server Engineering team you will have the opportunity to explore and contribute to a wide variety of interesting projects within Apple Pay If you meet the key qualifications and you are selfdriven enthusiastic highly motivated and you want to make an impact wed love to hear from youltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtltstronggtKey Qualificationsltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtMinimum 4 years relevant industry experienceltbrgtltbrgtExperience writing server software in Java or CC or CltbrgtltbrgtExperienceKnowledge working on highly scalable applications and RESTful web servicesltbrgtltbrgtKnowledge of databases both SQL and NoSQLltbrgtltbrgtFamiliarity with scalability and performance issuesltbrgtltbrgtUnderstand software development process from inception to delivery of code to productionltbrgtltbrgtStrong Computer Science backgroundltbrgtltbrgtExperienceunderstanding of security and cryptography not mandatoryltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtltstronggtDescriptionltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgt Responsible for designing and developing highly reliable scalable server platforms with attention to detail ltbrgtltbrgt Follow our software development process including writing unit tests perform code reviews etc  Ability to learn and apply new technologies quickly ltbrgtltbrgt Work effectively with crossfunctional teams to develop features ltbrgtltbrgt Provide support for production deployments ltbrgtltbrgt Demonstrate ability to deliver results on time with high qualityltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtltstronggtEducation ampamp Experienceltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtBachelor in Computer Science or equivalentltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtRole Number 200284886ltbrgtltbrgt
